cookingTips: Make simple syrup by dissolving sugar in hot water, then cool before adding to lemonade
Slice cucumber thinly and muddle gently with sugar to release flavor without bitter pith
Chill thoroughly and serve over ice, adjusting sweetness and lemon juice to taste
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the cook how to craft a refreshing infused beverage by properly extracting cucumber flavor and balancing sweetness with fresh lemon juice.
